page.title: 07MORE LOCAL NEWS FOR BROSELEY
page.content:
The advertisers included{Broseley {Fires,} which sell appliances for solid fuel burners.{Bryan & Knott, insurance brokers,are advertising for more business. There are several houses for sale in Broseley, one is a spacious town house at the price of Â£30,000 and the other is on a new estate at the price of Â£37,950.
Mrs Lyn Oakley is hoping to raise Â£6,000 for a decompression chamber to help local{multiple sclerosis sufferers.
There was news of local sports. In the{Bridgnorth Air Rifle}league, broseley social A was just beaten by one shot by Comrades B. In{Football,}Broseley Athletic team drew with Bloxwich 2-2.
